title: Moji Configuration Schema
description: Configuration schema for moji CLI tool

banner_font.title: Banner Font
banner_font.description: Default font for banner command (standard, shadow, slant, block, etc.)

banner_style.title: Banner Style
banner_style.description: Default style for banner output (none, bold, italic, etc.)

banner_border.title: Banner Border
banner_border.description: Default border for banner (none, single, double, round, bold, stars, hash, etc.)

convert_width.title: Convert Width
convert_width.description: Default width for ASCII art conversion in characters

convert_charset.title: Convert Charset
convert_charset.description: Default character set for ASCII conversion (standard, extended, blocks, etc.)

convert_dither.title: Convert Dither
convert_dither.description: Default dithering algorithm (none, floyd, bayer, etc.)

gradient_theme.title: Gradient Theme
gradient_theme.description: Default gradient theme (rainbow, neon, retro, fire, ocean, etc.)

gradient_mode.title: Gradient Mode
gradient_mode.description: Direction of gradient application (horizontal, vertical, diagonal)

bubble_style.title: Bubble Style
bubble_style.description: Default style for speech bubbles (round, square, cloud, etc.)

bubble_width.title: Bubble Width
bubble_width.description: Default width for speech bubbles in characters

qr_charset.title: QR Code Charset
qr_charset.description: Character set for QR code output (blocks, ascii, etc.)

pattern_border.title: Pattern Border
pattern_border.description: Default border style for patterns (single, double, etc.)

pattern_divider.title: Pattern Divider
pattern_divider.description: Default divider style for patterns (single, double, etc.)

copy_to_clipboard.title: Copy to Clipboard
copy_to_clipboard.description: Whether to automatically copy output to clipboard

json_output.title: JSON Output
json_output.description: Whether to output in JSON format by default

presets.title: Presets
presets.description: Named configuration presets for quick access

description.title: Description
description.description: Description of what this preset does

command.title: Command
command.description: The moji command this preset is for (banner, convert, art, etc.)

art_paths.title: Custom Art Paths
art_paths.description: Additional directories to search for ASCII art files

font_paths.title: Custom Font Paths
font_paths.description: Additional directories to search for font files

cowfile_paths.title: Cowfile Paths
cowfile_paths.description: Additional directories to search for cowfile art

aliases.title: Command Aliases
aliases.description: Custom aliases for frequently used commands

additionalProperties.title: Alias Command
additionalProperties.description: The command this alias expands to
